column5: It was really nice having all you guys up.We will have to do it again next year.And a special congrats to my little Buddy Ryan for his personal best and out fishing his  Dad   A G A I N!!!! Now Ryan keep all those little secrets safe under your lucky hat. Thanks again all, it was a blast. Dan

Yes I will do it again next year but this time I will make it into a long weekend I think we will be haeding up for some Salmon Captain Dan. Ryan wants to Walleye fishin this weekend so we are going to a new place.

Great report mike !!!!..glad to see you guys down there at quinte,and your son is sure turning out to be quite a great fisherman too !!!!...nice pics too,and thanks to dan for our stay at the cottage !!!!...cheers guys
Best smile ever!  Great report.
Some very nice fish you guys pulled in. Quality time with family is always great fun especially if its on the water! Gotta love it! All the best. -L.A
Great report and pics.  the Bay of Quinte certainly seems to hold a lot of nice eyes.
Great Report and pics MTP  Your son outfishing you and catching his PB......PRICELESS Give your son a fishermen hand shake for me.  Thanks for sharing Leechman

It was that time of year to meet up with Cousin Percher for my 2nd year in July Somewhere in the Bay of Quinte.  I began the trip with a Saturday 2:15am alarm clock buzzing awakening Hitting the snooze button until 2:53am.Finally dragged my old butt out of bed and proceeded to wake myself up and then my 9 year old son Ryan.  We left our place in St-Hubert Quebec at 3:27am first stop off the 401 was the Shell station and Timmies in Cornwall Ontario.  We left the outrages gas prices in Quebec behind ($144.9)and gladly paid the $1.28 in Cornwall top off the boat and filled up the Minivan $138 bucks later (OUCH  ) Arrived early in the Boq and met up with(cousin Percher and Fishin Devil and his family later. Well enough of the Bla Bla Bla and on with the pics.  Launched the fishin machine and proceeded to fish out five mins.and fish on it was a nice one until fish off  That spot shut down.   Junior wanted to try out steering the trolling motor so I let him wind the 2hp up to 4.7mph while he steered the kicker via the T-bar from the main motor.Time will come when he can drive the big motor.! minute of that was enough a screaming 2hp is not relaxing.   New spot and I am Happy but this was my only Eye of the weekend out of the 6hrs we fished.   Junior was just getting warmed up.Ryan could not find his new Rapala sunglasses well Mom told us Sunday night when we arrived that she found them in a pair of shorts in the washing machine they were very clean.I found a pair of sunglasses in the minivan and my son had to settle for the John Lennon look. He now claims they are lucky sunglasses    Luckily we got our limit thanks to Junior but we threw one back to swim another Day we got out in the evening and Junior gets a better fish to complete our limit of 4 I did get one of those  Around 9pm Fishin Devil and myself headed in just before the big storm came in so we missed out on the night bite. In the very little time we had to fish this weekend my son caught 8 Walleyes to my 1 eventhough some dinkers were sent back to swim another day.   Father and Son   My son with Fishin Devil's young daughter.  Now while us old folks were waiting for the Rain to stop Sunday Ryan my son and Fishin devil's daughter fished off the doc in the pouring rain.I think its in the blood             An 8 inch Dinker which went back to the BOQ.   Percher and fishin Devil trolling.   Fish on Percher net time for Fishin Devil.     Net time!     Percher and Fishin Devil heading in after a few nice ones while we continue to find fish after a couple of dinkers.   My little man with his new PB a 4lb walleye Man was he happy.     Percher with a 5lb eye.       Now Sunday I ended up with this guy and believe me my boy reminded me all the way down the 401 until we got home after a 4 hour drive.He reminded Mom that she will be eating fish because of him not Dad.   It was time to go home I wanted to stay but have to work Monday. I didn't do so well but my boy was long overdue after many outings he was just picking up some pan fish.  He was due for a great weekend I was very happy for him and very proud of him.  Had a great weekend with family Percher and wife Sue.  Good to see you again Sean(Fishin Devil and nice to meet your family.  I will be back and the Skunk will go away .  I hope you enjoyed our july Bay Of Quinte report.  Mike the Pike
Great report and pics Mike!!!  Looks like a great time was had by all!!!
awesome for your son on his pb walleye!  Looks like you guys had a great week on the boq  cheers!
Great report Mike, thanks...
Great report Mike, thanks.  Congrats to your son on the great weekend too.
WTG Ryan Maybe you can show your dad some of your technique, he's been in a slump long enough. Nice report Mike.  I'm off to 100o Islands on Sat.  We'll talk during the week.

Thanks for the report MTP. Looks like all the junior OFNers have been on fire lately!!! Congrats to the Junior for his PB.  Sons always outfish dads ... don't think there's much dads can do to change that lol
Great report Ryan! You got some very nice fish there. Tell your dad not to feel so bad. A good net man and a decent photographer are also important people on a fishing trip.

Your boys smile in the pic with you... slight.  Your boys smile with Fishin' Devils daughter... intense.  The next day your boy spending quality time in the rain at the end of the dock with his new chick...... classic.  Your boy ain't gonna be a boy for too much longer. lol.
Good report Mike, Having the young lad get a bunch is a great thing.  David  aka  Superdad

Hey Mike!  What a great report!  Your son certainly did have an amazing weekend....it's always nice to see the kids to the catching.  My little one asks "What if I catch the biggest and most fish?".  My answer is "I'd love to see that happen"...and I mean it!  Really good to see some fish caught...Percher had a nice one there, but this weekend belonged to your son.  I was fishing with Tracker and Skeeter on the weekend....and we talked about you a bit...saying that we haven't seen you around the board a whole lot lately.  Makes sense...you were out fishing!! LOL

Great Report! I look forward to being out fished one day by one of my kids!!!He sounds pretty hard core too fishing in that rain with the shorts and T-Shirt.lol Looks like he has got the bug for sure.Thanks for sharing.
Great report Mike.   Congrats to your son on his PB Walleye.
i've never had luck on quinte  i'm gonna need some lessons
Great report -- and priceless pics of your son
Great report Mike. Way to go Ryan!!!
Awesome report. Fishing buddies,kids and some fish. Perfect. TFS.
I was going to say Ryan's a chip off the old block when it comes to fishing, but then that wouldn't exactly be accurate would it?  .  (Great report Mike nice to see the smiles on the kids faces.)
Nice going Mike, Figured you would be outfished by you're young'un once again. Looks like all of ya had a good time, I enjoyed the pics cause I ain't getting too many walleye's here in Greece
Your kid is a walleye master.  Great pics and report. You must of had a great time.  Thanks for posting.
Great report,  congrats to the young lad for out fishing your dad.  I remember when I was young when ever I out fished my father you could not get that smile of my face for weeks.
Nice guiding job mike!! LOL  WTG Ryan!! Nice job outfishing the old man!! He must have taught you well kiddo!!  Sinker
Super report Mike.  Congrats to your son, he did awesome  Joey
Great report Mike and WTG Ryan thats what it's all about father and son weekends looks like every one had a good time  Rob

Well thanks for the kind words and the compliments you all Gave Ryan.  He is finally coming off cloud nine.  He said it was his best weekend ever fishing and wants to go back to Bay of Quinte as soon as possible.  It was made  his Day and we had alot of fish to eat thanks to the little man.  MTP
